transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Mam maine us din bhi hamari baat hui thi.
Tenders ke liye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To us din bhi aapne tenders ke liye fir aapne sir ko diya tha Arif sir ko.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ha to tenders ka issue aa raha hai mujhe tenders me kuch pata nahi lag raha tenders kaise pick karta hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai abhi aapko connect karwati hu sir mujhe ek do chije aur discuss karni thi agar aap video meet pe aa jaye to fir discuss kar lete hai.
Customer: Mam video meet pe.
Executive: Video meet se acha hamare
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Mere ko ek chij aur janni thi ki hamare yaha visitor hoga na IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ek month me to visit karne aana hi chahiye tha sir me ek month hone wala ek month ho chuka hai.
Executive: Sir aapki jaise sir aapki Arif sir se baat hui thi?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To sir unhone kya matlab bataya tha aapko mere according pata kiya hai.
Customer: Ji bataye.
Executive: Arif sir ne bhi humse kaha tha ki aapke kal do dhai do dhai teen baje tak aapke pass banda aayega meeting ke liye.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hamare pass koi wo hamare pass aaye nahi sir teen din ho gaye is baat ko.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Arif sir ne same day hi aapko connect kiya jis din aapne mujhko call ki thi I think unhone same day hi connect kiya hoga.
Customer: Unhone agle din jis din humne maine aapko aaj call kari thi unhone kaha tha agle din next day. Ki aapke pass hamara banda aayega kyuki meri baat hui thi sir teen char teen char baje ke aas pass.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To unhone kaha tha ki aapke pass aa jayega kal aa jayega dhai teen baje tak humne kaha tha char baje se pehle pehle bhej dena kyuki me char baje tak nikal jata hu office se.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To maine kaha tha char baje se pehle pehle bhej do.
Executive: Sir aap call pe hi rahiye mai ek bar connect kar leti hu apne senior se is bare me aap call pe hi rahiye.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji call pe rahiye sir.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji sir maine apne manager se discuss kiya hai abhi to sir mere jo hum logo ke engineers ka matter hai to sir hum aapko jo bhi guide kar sakte hai wo video meet ke through hi guide kar sakte hai koi bhi field visit ke liye koi banda aapko appoint nahi hoga.
Customer: Kyu? Aur abhi meri abhi jo meri manager hai wo bhi aapko bar call karegi to wo bhi agar jo bhi aapko guide karegi na wo video meet ya call pe hi guide kar payengi.
Customer: Mam mujhe ek chij janna hai ki hamare pass visitor bhi nahi aayega. Aisa kyu hua ki hamare pass appointment ki me pehli bar to chala nahi raha IndiaMART usse pehle bhi chalaya tha. Heritage karke company hai hamari ek.
Heritage karke company thi bahut achcha package chalta tha hamara usse. Ji ji.
Customer: Aur usse humse har mahine month me do bar koi aa sakta visitor hamari team ko visit karke pura samjha ke jata tha har month me ek aise do bar. Thik hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Delhi se karte the. To hame to pata hai ki IndiaMART wale visit karte hai magar is bar kyu nahi kar rahe. Kyuki me single package nahi le raha. Ha matlab ye pehle kab use kiya tha?
Customer: Mam isse pehle to meri nayi company hai me to isko nayi company hamari launch hui hai Krishna Plant House karke matlab one year ho gaya ise one year se bhi jyada ho gaya matlab iska humne IndiaMART ka package first time liya hai.
Hello.
Hello.
Customer: Yaar aapko meri voice aa rahi hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello hanji sir sir abhi aap video meet ke liye aap free ho to video meet kar lete hai abhi meri manager jo hai na wo aapko call karegi is matter pe jo aapka concern hai na field visit wala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi meri bilkul mai call disconnect karungi meri manager abhi aapko call kar rahi hai wo aapko explain kar denge jaise ki matlab kya issue aa raha hai. Thik hai. Thik hai aap manager se baat kar lijiye mujhe ji ji ek just a second sir aap mujhe ye bata dijiye ki usko abhi video meet ke liye aap free hai to mai tender wala issue jo hai na wo resolve karwa deti hu aapka.
Customer: Aap hi bataoge na ise tender wale issue ko ki koi aur batayega.
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Ha ji ha ji. Mai keh raha tender wala jo hai wo aap hi bataoge na video meet pe.
Executive: Ji ji mai hi bataungi video meet pe aapko.
Customer: Koi aur to nahi batayega na?
Executive: Nahi nahi mai hi bataungi.
Customer: To mam fir aap batao ha to aap bataoge to fir mujhe 12 baje ke baad call karna video meet ke liye. Agar koi aur banda ha agar koi aur banda hai jo aapko batayega to fir me abhi online aata hu kyuki me thoda busy tha abhi.
Executive: Thik hai mai 12 baje connect karungi aap 12 baje baat kar lijiye abhi meri manager aapko call karegi thik hai.
Customer: Okay thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about the tender process.

- Wants a visitor from IndiaMART for assistance.

- Enquired why field visits are not happening.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect with senior regarding field visit.

- Manager will call to explain field visit policy.

- Tender issue will be resolved via video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer.

- Executive will connect at 12 for video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, tenders, video meet, manager call
